item.title: Whale Watching from Friday Harbor
item.description: Get up close with the orca whales off the San Juan Islands near Seattle on this half-day whale-watching cruise. San Juan Island is where the southern resident killer whales live about six months out of the year, from mid-April to October. It’s also considered the best place to view orca whales.

image.alt: Whale Watching from Friday Harbor

item.title: Whale Watching Tour from Anacortes
item.description: Get up close with the killer whales of Anacortes, the home port to the San Juan Islands, on this whale-watching cruise led by naturalist guides. Climb aboard a Blackfish fleet vessel and travel through some of the most picturesque scenery in the Pacific Northwest searching for orca, humpback, and gray whales. Along the way, see ocean wildlife in their natural environment, like seals, porpoises, sea lions and otters—plus a wide variety of birds and more.

image.alt: Whale Watching Tour from Anacortes

item.title: Orcas Island Whale Watching
item.description: Get up close with the killer whales off Orcas Island, the largest of the San Juan Islands near Seattle, on this guided, 3.5-hour whale-watching cruise from Eastsound. Led by naturalist guides and captains, climb aboard a Blackfish fleet vessel and travel through some of the most picturesque scenery in the Pacific Northwest searching for orca, humpback and gray whales. Along the way, see ocean wildlife in their natural environment, like seals, porpoises, sea lions and otters — plus a wide variety of birds and more. Sightings are guaranteed from April through early September.

image.alt: Orcas Island Whale Watching

item.title: Full Day San Juan Island Kayaking Adventure
item.description: Spend a picturesque six hours in and around the water on this kayaking tour, with a friendly guide to help you navigate the water and prepare your lunch on the beach. You’ll float through a wildlife habitat that’s home to the likes of seals, porpoises, and orcas. But don’t forget to look up for a chance at spotting some eagles too.

image.alt: Full Day San Juan Island Kayaking Adventure

item.title: Guaranteed Whale Watching Tour
item.description: Observe Pacific Northwest whales in their natural environment on a 3.5-hour tour from Seattle. You have the chance to get up close to orcas, humpbacks, and minkes. Learn about the marine life from your on board guide. In the event that you don’t see any whales during your excursion, enjoy a second journey on the boat free of charge.

image.alt: Guaranteed Whale Watching Tour

item.title: Tree Canopy Climbing on Lopez Island
item.description: Seize the rare opportunity to climb some of the tallest trees in the world on this canopy tree-climbing adventure at Deception Pass State Park. This 4-hour, small-group outing offers the unique perspective of a monkey or bird, swinging through the open air, catching branches and climbing to breathtaking views. All necessary safety equipment is included.

image.alt: Tree Canopy Climbing on Lopez Island

item.title: Kayaking in Deception Pass State Park
item.description: See Whidbey Island in Washington from a fresh perspective with a small-group kayaking tour in Deception Pass State Park. Meet your guide at a departure point and climb into a sea kayak to explore the calm waters of Bowman Bay. Learn the basics of paddling and admire views of wildlife, Fidalgo Island, and more. All gear including life jackets is provided.

image.alt: Kayaking in Deception Pass State Park

item.title: 3-Hour Sea Kayak Tour in the San Juan Islands
item.description: Explore Washington state’s San Juan Islands Monument on this sea kayak tour starting in Anacortes. Join a small group to paddle past the stunning scenery of uninhabited islands including Burrows Island. There is also an opportunity to spot local wildlife such as harbor seals, porpoises, several fish species, and sometimes even orcas.

image.alt: 3-Hour Sea Kayak Tour in the San Juan Islands

item.title: Chuckanut Bay Distillery Tour with 2 Mini Cocktails and Gift Glass
item.description: Visit a true grain-to-glass distillery in the heart of Bellingham and see how bourbon, gin, vodka, and whiskey are produced from locally grown grains. Tour the Chuckanut Bay Distillery, located in a historic building, and enjoy a guided tasting of different spirits and to mini cocktails. Includes a complimentary souvenir shot glass to take home with you.

image.alt: Chuckanut Bay Distillery Tour with 2 Mini Cocktails and Gift Glass

item.title: Half Day Sail Orcas Island
item.description: Try your hand at sailing with this three-hour experience from Orcas Island. An experienced US Coast Guard-licensed captain/instructor will teach you and your group of up to six people all about sailing, from terminology to how to navigate. You'll also have plenty of time to get hands-on experience as you help guide your vessel through Obstruction Pass.

image.alt: Half Day Sail Orcas Island

item.title: 2-Day Fully-Catered Kayak Camping Trip in the San Juan Islands
item.description: A full-catered trip, this multi-day tour takes you to experience kayaking and camping in the San Juan Islands, specifically Cypress Island. This island is a gem within the San Juan archipelago, boasting protected conservation and natural areas that teem with wildlife. Explore miles of trails leading to viewpoints and secluded coves with pebble beaches. Enjoy having exclusive access to this hidden paradise during this tour.

image.alt: 2-Day Fully-Catered Kayak Camping Trip in the San Juan Islands

item.title: Orca whale tour from Orcas Island
item.description: For those who are especially passionate about Orcas, this trip is for you! Be prepared for up to five hours on the water in the diligent quest for the region's Biggs killer whales. This population of orca is healthy and thriving and can be found year-round in the Salish Sea. They are incredible to watch and can travel over 100 miles in a single day. We load up on our on fastest vessels and depart in search of orcas. We may also encounter the regions other species of whales and wildlife, but the focus is finding orcas. Our success rate is very high, over 95 percent! Tours typically last between 3 to 5 hrs. It can often be a cold trip so bundle up. Don't forget your camera!

image.alt: Orca whale tour from Orcas Island

item.title: Sunset Canopy Climb on Lopez Island
item.description: Give life an exciting twist with this 4-hour canopy climbing adventure at Deception Pass State Park. Climb up the canopy with help from your guide, and relax once you get to the very top. Enjoy beautiful views of the sun setting over the mountains before rappelling back down 200 feet (61 meters) under the moonlight.

image.alt: Sunset Canopy Climb on Lopez Island

item.title: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Bellingham WA
item.description:
Step into the shoes of a newly-minted detective, tasked by Commander Mahoney to solve a gripping case... murder on the streets of Bellingham.
Throughout this crime-solving audio adventure, visit each of the 10 mapped locations. You'll have the option to explore the downtown area using the Walking Map or follow a Driving Map on the city's outskirts. Once you choose, the exact starting point will be revealed. *See images for route.
Park or stop at each location, listen to the audio story, and put your detective skills to the test by gathering clues and piecing together the evidence. Finally, make your deductions and issue an arrest warrant.
Your overall detective skills will be evaluated, culminating in a Case Performance Score to measure your sleuthing prowess. This game is suitable for solo detectives, dynamic duos, or groups of mystery enthusiasts, offering an immersive audio tale filled with intrigue.

image.alt: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Bellingham WA

item.title: The Orcas Project Wine Tasting
item.description: Indulge in specially curated wines and cheeses during this guided tasting at The Orcas Project in Eastsound. The tasting flights feature a rotating selection of wines created in collaboration with vineyards and artists in the region, ensuring a uniquely Pacific Northwest flavor. Enjoy the wine flight paired with a cheese board while you learn more about the project -- or perhaps meet the makers! After the tasting, wander around Eastsound to check out boutique shops, bakeries, and more.

image.alt: The Orcas Project Wine Tasting

item.title: Ultimate Scavenger Bellingham
item.description:
Washington's favorite scavenger hunt!
Whether visitor or long time local, this hunt is an amazing and entertaining way to learn about the city.
1) You will receive 20 clues via email to locations all around the city.
2) With the clues you will attempt to find destinations! Search online, ask locals, whatever you need to do!
3) By visiting landmarks, businesses, and other interesting locations, you get to see the best the city has to offer!
4) Take selfies and email photos with your group at any time to earn a completion certificate and possible other prizes!

image.alt: Ultimate Scavenger Bellingham

item.title: Bioluminescence and Sunset Kayak Tour in the San Juan Islands
item.description: There are very few places in the world where you can experience the stars in the sky and illuminated water around you at the same time. Our trip starts off with a beautiful sunset paddle in Griffin Bay off of San Juan Island where we kayak among harbor seals, roosting birds, and other wildlife. Then as the night progresses, the environment around us becomes even more serene as the bioluminescent sea life comes to life. This is one of those experiences that you will truly remember forever.

image.alt: Bioluminescence and Sunset Kayak Tour in the San Juan Islands

item.title: Friday Harbor Frenzy Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote and interactive live host to assist and encourage you through your phone.
We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 500 cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures include a tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, learning tool, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture challenges-for points! Regardless of their score, they enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard. They can race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors with them that day.
Get ready to learn, discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your OWN!

image.alt: Friday Harbor Frenzy Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Scenic Coast and Wildlife Tour
item.description:
We are the only on island company offering natural history hiking tours. We also provide natural history interpretation of the local flora, fauna, and geology.
Our Mission: To provide an experience rooted in nature, community, and culture that is fun, interactive, and informative. And to do so with a positive and minimal impact on the environment and communities in which we operate.
1% of all profits are given to environmental causes supporting the San Juan Islands.

image.alt: Scenic Coast and Wildlife Tour

item.title: VW Bus City Tour of Bellingham
item.description: Get off the beaten path on this tour, which will show you around North and Northeast Portland in a VW bus. You'll visit artsy Alberta Street, known for its shops, restaurants, and murals; spend time in sprawling Peninsula Park, and visit a local oddities shop, with time left over to grab a snack at a food cart pod. Both 2-hour small-group tours and 4-hour private tours are available.

image.alt: VW Bus City Tour of Bellingham

item.title: Rent 4 Seater ATV Side by Side
item.description: You will get to experience the great outdoors of Washington state, particularly around the Deming area.

image.alt: Rent 4 Seater ATV Side by Side

item.title: Mountain Bike Half-Day Private Tour
item.description:
Deep local knowledge: The trails around Bellingham can be very confusing! Our guides have a deep wealth of local trail knowledge, allowing you to optimize your time and enjoyment in the gem that is Bellingham!
Convenience: Dig Deep Tours brings together everything you need to get out for the ride of your life - all in one place! Book a tour and you wont have to worry about finding gear rentals or trail recommendations. Mountain Bike rentals are also available on our website.
Contagious passion: Our guides absolutely love riding mountain bikes. It's hard not to feed off that kind of energy!
** Bike rentals are not included, must be reserved separately**

image.alt: Mountain Bike Half-Day Private Tour

item.title: Scenic Family Adventure with Butchart Gardens and City Highlights
item.description:
Explore Victoria in style with our eco-friendly luxury tours, offering a state-of-the-art AI Historical audio assistant. I will share captivating historical tales, including haunted legends, quirky facts, and intriguing insights about the city. Travel sustainably and comfortably while uncovering iconic landmarks and hidden gems. With hassle-free pick-up and drop-off services, we make your journey effortless because everyone matters. Book today for a fascinating and unforgettable adventure!
Ticket price varies, Contact us for Ticket Prices. This tour is customizable, with the duration at each attraction adjusted based on the tour's pace and pickup location.

image.alt: Scenic Family Adventure with Butchart Gardens and City Highlights

item.title: 4 Course Dinner Luxury Yacht Dinner cruise out of Friday Harbor
item.description: Enjoy a 90' luxury expedition style vessel, with your local Crew. We showcase the best that the San Juan Islands has to offer in a smaller group size. Private group bookings only. There is nothing quite like it! Mother nature is out there to explore and we take the time to enjoy the view. No fast pace here, just wonderful service and a beautiful platform to enjoy your excursion with multiple species to discover along the way.

image.alt: 4 Course Dinner Luxury Yacht Dinner cruise out of Friday Harbor
